verses.name: 1 Kings 6:15
verses.text: And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar, both the floor of the house, and the walls of the cieling: and he covered them on the inside with wood, and covered the floor of the house with planks of fir.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:16
verses.text: And he built twenty cubits on the sides of the house, both the floor and the walls with boards of cedar: he even built them for it within, even for the oracle, even for the most holy place.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:17
verses.text: And the house, that is, the temple before it, was forty cubits long.
